title: Is it Fard or Sunnah to Pray in the Masjid
transcript: from Sagal ibima I wanted to ask if U praying in the Masid is or is it I don't really know the prayer in the Masjid for men who are capable and healthy and adults and they live within the vicinity of the Masjid where the aan in normal circum cumstances without loud speakers could travel the distance maybe a kilometer or a kilometer and a half a little bit more a little bit less it is mandatory upon such men because the prophet Alat when a a blind man came seeking concession and permission to pray home and not to pray in the Masjid the prophet asked him one question he said do you hear the aan the man said yes he said answer the call of the aan there is no excuse for you and Allah Knows Best
